headline: Delta Electronics Strengthens Southeast Asia Presence with New Leadership and Market Expansion
summary: Delta Electronics, a global leader in power management and smart green solutions, today announced strategic efforts to strengthen its presence across Southeast Asia and Oceania in response to strong business growth. The Company is appointing new SEA region and country leadership to leverage regional resources, accelerate execution, and enhance customer engagement. headline: Delta Air Lines Balances Major Fleet Orders With Winter Disruption Risks
summary: Delta Air Lines (NYSE:DAL) announces orders for 31 new Airbus widebody aircraft as part of a fleet refresh. The company also agrees to acquire up to 60 Boeing 787-10 aircraft, expanding long haul capabilities. At the same time, severe winter weather in the Northeast triggers major operational disruptions and flight suspensions at key airports. Delta Air Lines, a major U.S. carrier with a global route network, is moving to update and simplify its long haul fleet with new Airbus and Boeing...
